name: A Cold Christmas at Nave
description:
Note: Don't mind about the really bad graphics, you playing as a child, so this is from a child's perspective. :P

Night 358

In 2016, there's a medieval village called "Twilight Village", all the villagers are celebrating Christmas Eve at the Castle. Christmas is here, where joy are scattered throughout the village! King Coombaiia VII is throwing a huge Christmas party at his castle and all peasants of Twilight Village are celebrating this event! Well... all except for one...

This story tells a young child named Sidney, in a cold Christmas night, wandering around... nobody is there to help him.

It's a cold Christmas night, he escaped from an unknown territory and found a poster about Coombaiia VII's party. Too weak to grab a weapon, too dark to see the path, too dangerous to walk alone... will he be able to seek for help?

Behind the fourth wall, lies his hope of making through this nightmare. It is up to you to help this poor kid into the castle, where everybody is... BUT BEWARE!

You are all alone... and you're not alone... Something... is after you...
